metadata.title: CVE-2017-14628 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In sam2p 0.49.3, a heap-based buffer overflow exists in the pcxLoadImage24function of the file in_pcx.cpp.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14628` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

sam2p - 0.49.2-3+deb8u3build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sam2p package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.49.2-3+deb8u3build0.16.04.1').
